extendedInfo.description: Perfect striker is a fun ball throwing game.You have a board of 9 grid numbered from 1 to 9.Set a target and throw the ball to hit it. Get bonus point for a successful hit. Clear the board with limited number of balls. As you go to next stage, number of balls is decreased and board distance is increased. Check your ball throwing accuracy! The game implements local and global ranking. play and put your name on the ranking!
